alert.note: Alert for Panola (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 09 at 9:27PM CST until March 12 at 5:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN PANOLA...SOUTHEASTERN RUSK...NORTH CENTRAL NACOGDOCHES AND NORTHWESTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 927 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Minden, or 17 miles southeast of Henderson, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Garrison, Minden, Trawick, Appleby, Mount Enterprise, Dotson and Lawsonville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
